title: German nut cake
ingredients: ['300g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '100g sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons milk or water', '150g to 250g butter', 'For the filling', '1 to 2 egg whites (save the yolks!)', '400g ground mixed nuts', 'caster sugar, to taste']
